meanings.definition: Occurring as an unexpected development or consequence.
meanings.sent1: The supervening storm caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The supervening rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent3: The supervening snowfall turned the town into a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The supervening chaos in the classroom made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The supervening darkness enveloped the forest, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Coming as an addition or extension.
meanings.sent1: The supervening tasks added to our already busy schedule.
meanings.sent2: The supervening decorations made the party even more festive.
meanings.sent3: The supervening toppings on the pizza made it a delicious mess.
meanings.sent4: The supervening branches on the tree reached out like welcoming arms.
meanings.sent5: The supervening layers of paint gave the room a fresh look.
